title: SOLD SOLD SOLD - T206 Beaumont - Missing Red / No B - Raw Beater - SOLD SOLD SOLD
author: T206.org

posts.post_title: SOLD SOLD SOLD - T206 Beaumont - Missing Red / No B - Raw Beater - SOLD SOLD SOLD

posts.post_content:
Hey Trae, 
I usually keep my composure on these things but somewhat frustrated that I won this lot on ebay and after winning the lot received a response from the seller that the cards are actually not for sale. 

[url]http://www.ebay.com/itm/380364886516?ssPageName=STRK:MEWNX:IT&_trksid=p3984.m1439.l2649[/url]

I'm not sure if there was a side deal but I literally used the BIN option minutes after the listing was posted. Perhaps this is a complete misunderstanding and the seller decided to not post the listing even though he did.

I'm interested in both cards and can chat with you via email to discuss further. 

George
George, I'll be responding to your email shortly.

This is the second Beaumont in one week on eBay to have faded red, interesting.  I too noticed these two being sold together and bet they are both victims of some sort of red eating chemical/liquid bath..nom nom nom.

Still neat looking.
